decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: 910-DWG-000-OS OS MAP, 910-DWG-000-SP Block Plan, 910-DWG-000-00 P1 Existing Floor Plans,910-DWG-000-01 Existing Roof Plan, 910-DWG-020-AA Existing Section AA, 910-DWG-020-BB Existing Section BB, 910-DWG-100-XX P2 Proposed Floor Plans, 910-DWG-010-xx-2 P2 Existing Elevations, 910-DWG-110-xx P2 Proposed Elevations, 910-DWG-101-XX P2 Proposed Floor Plans, 910-DWG-120-AA Proposed Section AA, 910-DWG-120-BB Proposed Section BB
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless specified on the application form.

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7B of the Development Management DPD (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 1.1 (g), 2.1 (c) and 2.10 of the Adopted Core Strategy (2012).
| The proposed rooflights hereby approved shall not project more than 150mm from the roof plane and retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To minimise light spillage and interference with the privacy and outlook of adjoining occupiers and in the interests of good neighbourliness and in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013).

| The window/s inserted in the side elevations shall be obscure glazed and non-opening (where openable parts less than 1.7m above floor) unless otherwise confirmed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.
Reason: To safeguard neighbouring amenity from light pollution in accordance with policy 7A of Ealing's Development Management DPD (2013) and policy D6 of the London Plan (2021).
| No part of the flat roofs of the hereby approved development shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with policies 7A ,7B and 7D of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013) and policy D6 of the London Plan (2021).
description: Single storey wraparound rear extension (following demolition of existing rear addition); rear roof extension; outrigger roof extension; installation of one rooflight to front roof slope
